history.proof: intros tr o Hnot_key Hkey_in_both. unfold key_in_output_trace, key_in_output_list in *. destruct Hkey_in_both as [os [h [Hin_key Hkey_in_os]]]. shelve.

chat.content:
I will give you a Coq proof state, including both hypotheses and a specific goal and your need to prove it. Your response should be a singular code block of Coq proof, without any additional explanation or commentary. Follow to these guidelines:
Introduce variables using unique names to avoid any conflicts.
Keep each command distinct and separated, avoid concatenations like ';' or '[cmd|cmd]'.
Organize your proof with bullets like '-', '+', and '*' instead of braces ({, }). Shift to their double symbols like '--' and '++', when necessary.
Effectively use given premises, follow the syntax and structure demonstrated in the examples provided.

Example 1:

Hypotheses:
n, m: nat
IHn: m + n = n + m

Goal:
m + S n = S n + m

Proof:
```simpl. rewrite <- IHn. auto.```

Example 2:
Hypotheses:

Goal:
forall n m : nat, m + n = n + m

```intros n m. induction n.
- simpl. auto.
- simpl. rewrite <- IHn. auto.```

Sovle This Proof State:

Hypotheses:
orig_base_params: BaseParams
one_node_params: OneNodeParams orig_base_params
raft_params: RaftParams orig_base_params
lmi: log_matching_interface
si: sorted_interface
aemi: applied_entries_monotonic_interface
smsi: state_machine_safety_interface
misi: max_index_sanity_interface
client: clientId
id: nat

Goal:
forall tr o : list (name * (raft_input + list raft_output)), ~ key_in_output_trace client id tr -> key_in_output_trace client id (tr ++ o) -> key_in_output_trace client id o

Premises:
Inductive raft_input (orig_base_params : BaseParams) (raft_params : RaftParams orig_base_params) : Type := Timeout : raft_input | ClientRequest : clientId -> nat -> input -> raft_input Arguments raft_input {orig_base_params raft_params} Arguments Timeout {orig_base_params raft_params} Arguments ClientRequest {orig_base_params raft_params} _ _%nat_scope
key_in_output_trace = fun (orig_base_params : BaseParams) (raft_params : RaftParams orig_base_params) (client : clientId) (id : nat) (tr : list (name * (raft_input + list raft_output))) => exists (os : list raft_output) (h : name), In (h, inr os) tr /\ key_in_output_list client id os : forall (orig_base_params : BaseParams) (raft_params : RaftParams orig_base_params), clientId -> nat -> list (name * (raft_input + list raft_output)) -> Prop Arguments key_in_output_trace {orig_base_params raft_params} _ _%nat_scope _%list_scope
Record RaftParams (orig_base_params : BaseParams) : Type := Build_RaftParams { N : nat; input_eq_dec : forall x y : input, {x = y} + {x <> y}; output_eq_dec : forall x y : output, {x = y} + {x <> y}; clientId : Type; clientId_eq_dec : forall x y : clientId, {x = y} + {x <> y} } Arguments Build_RaftParams _ _%nat_scope (_ _)%function_scope [clientId]%type_scope _%function_scope

Record log_matching_interface (orig_base_params : BaseParams) (one_node_params : OneNodeParams orig_base_params) (raft_params : RaftParams orig_base_params) : Prop := Build_log_matching_interface { log_matching_invariant : forall net : network, raft_intermediate_reachable net -> log_matching net } Arguments log_matching_interface {orig_base_params one_node_params raft_params} Arguments Build_log_matching_interface {orig_base_params one_node_params raft_params} _%function_scope

is_output_with_key = fun (orig_base_params : BaseParams) (raft_params : RaftParams orig_base_params) (client : clientId) (id : nat) (trace_entry : name * (raft_input + list raft_output)) => let (_, s) := trace_entry in match s with | inl _ => false | inr os => if key_in_output_list_dec client id os then true else false end : forall (orig_base_params : BaseParams) (raft_params : RaftParams orig_base_params), clientId -> nat -> name * (raft_input + list raft_output) -> bool Arguments is_output_with_key {orig_base_params raft_params} _ _%nat_scope

handleClientRequest_logs_sorted : forall (h : name) (client : clientId) (id : nat) (c : input) (out : list raft_output) (st : raft_data) (l : list (name * msg)) (net : network), handleClientRequest h (nwState net h) client id c = (out, st, l) -> raft_intermediate_reachable net -> logs_sorted_host net -> sorted (log st)

step_failure_star_raft_intermediate_reachable_extend : forall (f : list Net.name) (net : network) (f' : list Net.name) (net' : network) (tr : list (Net.name * (input + list output))), step_failure_star (f, net) (f', net') tr -> raft_intermediate_reachable net -> raft_intermediate_reachable net'
step_failure_disk_ops_sind : forall P : list do_name * do_network -> list do_name * do_network -> list (do_name * (input + list output)) -> SProp, (forall (net net' : do_network) (failed : list do_name) (p : do_packet) (xs ys : list do_packet) (ops : list (disk_op file_name)) (out : list output) (d : data) (l : list (do_name * do_msg)), nwdoPackets net = xs ++ p :: ys -> ~ In (do_pDst p) failed -> do_net_handlers (do_pDst p) (do_pSrc p) (do_pBody p) (nwdoState net (do_pDst p)) = (ops, out, d, l) -> net' = {| nwdoPackets := do_send_packets (do_pDst p) l ++ xs ++ ys; nwdoState := update do_name_eq_dec (nwdoState net) (do_p...
fst_execute_log' : forall (log : list entry) (st : data) (tr : list (input * output)), fst (execute_log' log st tr) = tr ++ fst (execute_log' log st [])
is_input_with_key = fun (orig_base_params : BaseParams) (raft_params : RaftParams orig_base_params) (client : clientId) (id : nat) (trace_entry : name * (raft_input + list raft_output)) => let (_, s) := trace_entry in match s with | inl (ClientRequest c i _) => (if clientId_eq_dec client c then true else false) && (id =? i) | _ => false end : forall (orig_base_params : BaseParams) (raft_params : RaftParams orig_base_params), clientId -> nat -> name * (raft_input + list raft_output) -> bool Arguments is_input_with_key {orig_base_params raft_params} _ _%nat_scope
in_applied_entries = fun (orig_base_params : BaseParams) (one_node_params : OneNodeParams orig_base_params) (raft_params : RaftParams orig_base_params) (client : clientId) (id : nat) (net : network) => exists e : entry, eClient e = client /\ eId e = id /\ In e (applied_entries (nwState net)) : forall (orig_base_params : BaseParams) (one_node_params : OneNodeParams orig_base_params) (raft_params : RaftParams orig_base_params), clientId -> nat -> network -> Prop Arguments in_applied_entries {orig_base_params one_node_params raft_params} _ _%nat_scope
raft_net_invariant_client_request = fun (orig_base_params : BaseParams) (one_node_params : OneNodeParams orig_base_params) (raft_params : RaftParams orig_base_params) (P : network -> Prop) => forall (h : name) (net : network) (st' : name -> data) (ps' : list packet) (out : list raft_output) (d : raft_data) (l : list (name * msg)) (client : clientId) (id : nat) (c : input), handleClientRequest h (nwState net h) client id c = (out, d, l) -> P net -> raft_intermediate_reachable net -> (forall h' : name, st' h' = update name_eq_dec (nwState net) h d h') ->...-> Prop Arguments raft_net_invariant_client_request {orig_base_params one_node_params raft_params} _%function_scope
cacheApplyEntry = fun (orig_base_params : BaseParams) (one_node_params : OneNodeParams orig_base_params) (raft_params : RaftParams orig_base_params) (st : RaftState.raft_data term name entry logIndex serverType data clientId output) (e : entry) => match getLastId st (eClient e) with | Some (id, o) => if eId e <? id then ([], st) else if eId e =? id then ([o], st) else applyEntry st e | None => applyEntry st e end : forall orig_base_params : BaseParams, OneNodeParams orig_base_params -> forall raft_params : RaftParams orig_base_params, RaftState.raft_data term name entry logIndex serverType data clientId output -> entry -> list output * RaftState.raft_data term name entry logIndex serverType data clientId output Arguments cacheApplyEntry {orig_base_params one_node_params raft_params}
applyEntries = fun (orig_base_params : BaseParams) (one_node_params : OneNodeParams orig_base_params) (raft_params : RaftParams orig_base_params) => fix applyEntries (h : name) (st : raft_data) (entries : list entry) {struct entries} : list raft_output * raft_data := match entries with | [] => ([], st) | e :: es => let (out, st0) := cacheApplyEntry st e in let out0 := if name_eq_dec (eAt e) h then map (fun o : output => ClientResponse (eClient e) (eId e) o) out else [] in let (out', state) := applyEntries h st0 es in (out0 ++ out', state) end : forall orig_base_params : BaseParams, OneNodeParams orig_base_params ->...-> list raft_output * raft_data Arguments applyEntries {orig_base_params one_node_params raft_params} _ _ _%list_scope
Build_sorted_interface : (forall (net : network) (p : packet) (t : term) (n : name) (pli : logIndex) (plt : term) (es : list entry) (ci : logIndex) (st' : raft_data) (m : msg), raft_intermediate_reachable net -> logs_sorted net -> handleAppendEntries (pDst p) (nwState net (pDst p)) t n pli plt es ci = (st', m) -> pBody p = AppendEntries t n pli plt es ci -> In p (nwPackets net) -> sorted (log st')) ->...-> sorted_interface
collate_not_in_mid : forall (A B : Type) (A_eq_dec : forall x y : A, {x = y} + {x <> y}) (h h' : A) (l1 l2 : list (A * B)) (f : A -> A -> list B) (m : B), ~ In h (map fst (l1 ++ l2)) -> collate A_eq_dec h' (update2 A_eq_dec f h' h (f h' h ++ [m])) (l1 ++ l2) = collate A_eq_dec h' f (l1 ++ (h, m) :: l2)
RaftInputHandler = fun (orig_base_params : BaseParams) (one_node_params : OneNodeParams orig_base_params) (raft_params : RaftParams orig_base_params) (me : name) (inp : raft_input) (state : raft_data) => let '(handlerOut, state0, pkts) := handleInput me inp state in let '(leaderOut, state1, leaderPkts) := doLeader state0 me in let '(genericOut, state2, genericPkts) := doGenericServer me state1 in (handlerOut ++ leaderOut ++ genericOut, state2, pkts ++ leaderPkts ++ genericPkts) : forall orig_base_params : BaseParams, OneNodeParams orig_base_params -> forall raft_params : RaftParams orig_base_params, name -> raft_input -> raft_data -> list raft_output * raft_data * list (name * msg) Arguments RaftInputHandler {orig_base_params one_node_params raft_params}
RaftNetHandler = fun (orig_base_params : BaseParams) (one_node_params : OneNodeParams orig_base_params) (raft_params : RaftParams orig_base_params) (me src : name) (m : msg) (state : raft_data) => let (state0, pkts) := handleMessage src me m state in let '(leaderOut, state1, leaderPkts) := doLeader state0 me in let '(genericOut, state2, genericPkts) := doGenericServer me state1 in (leaderOut ++ genericOut, state2, pkts ++ leaderPkts ++ genericPkts) : forall orig_base_params : BaseParams, OneNodeParams orig_base_params -> forall raft_params : RaftParams orig_base_params, name -> name -> msg -> raft_data -> list raft_output * raft_data * list (name * msg) Arguments RaftNetHandler {orig_base_params one_node_params raft_params}
collate_not_in : forall (A B : Type) (A_eq_dec : forall x y : A, {x = y} + {x <> y}) (h h' : A) (l1 l2 : list (A * B)) (f : A -> A -> list B), ~ In h' (map fst l1) -> collate A_eq_dec h f (l1 ++ l2) h h' = collate A_eq_dec h f l2 h h'
is_client_response = fun (orig_base_params : BaseParams) (raft_params : RaftParams orig_base_params) (client : clientId) (id : nat) (o : output) (out : raft_output) => match out with | NotLeader _ _ => false | ClientResponse c i o' => (if clientId_eq_dec client c then true else false) && (id =? i) && (if output_eq_dec o o' then true else false) end : forall (orig_base_params : BaseParams) (raft_params : RaftParams orig_base_params), clientId -> nat -> output -> raft_output -> bool Arguments is_client_response {orig_base_params raft_params} _ _%nat_scope
step_failure_ind : forall P : list Net.name * network -> list Net.name * network -> list (Net.name * (input + list output)) -> Prop, (forall (net net' : network) (failed : list Net.name) (p : packet) (xs ys : list packet) (out : list output) (d : data) (l : list (Net.name * Net.msg)), nwPackets net = xs ++ p :: ys -> ~ In (pDst p) failed -> net_handlers (pDst p) (pSrc p) (pBody p) (nwState net (pDst p)) = (out, d, l) -> net' = {| nwPackets := send_packets (pDst p) l ++ xs ++ ys; nwState := update Net.name_eq_dec (nwState net) (pDst p) d |} -> P (failed, net) (failed, net') [(pDst p, inr out)]) ->...-> P p p0 l
step_failure_sind : forall P : list Net.name * network -> list Net.name * network -> list (Net.name * (input + list output)) -> SProp, (forall (net net' : network) (failed : list Net.name) (p : packet) (xs ys : list packet) (out : list output) (d : data) (l : list (Net.name * Net.msg)), nwPackets net = xs ++ p :: ys -> ~ In (pDst p) failed -> net_handlers (pDst p) (pSrc p) (pBody p) (nwState net (pDst p)) = (out, d, l) -> net' = {| nwPackets := send_packets (pDst p) l ++ xs ++ ys; nwState := update Net.name_eq_dec (nwState net) (pDst p) d |} -> P (failed, net) (failed, net') [(pDst p, inr out)]) ->...-> P p p0 l
execute_log' = fun (orig_base_params : BaseParams) (one_node_params : OneNodeParams orig_base_params) (raft_params : RaftParams orig_base_params) => fix execute_log' (log : list entry) (st : data) (l : list (input * output)) {struct log} : list (input * output) * data := match log with | [] => (l, st) | e :: log' => let '(o, st') := handler (eInput e) st in execute_log' log' st' (l ++ [(eInput e, o)]) end : forall orig_base_params : BaseParams, OneNodeParams orig_base_params -> forall raft_params : RaftParams orig_base_params, list entry -> data -> list (input * output) -> list (input * output) * data Arguments execute_log' {orig_base_params one_node_params raft_params} _%list_scope _ _%list_scope

```   
intros tr o Hnot_key Hkey_in_both.
unfold key_in_output_trace, key_in_output_list in *.
intros Hcontr.
destruct Hkey_in_both as [os [h [Hin_key Hkey_in_os]]].
contradiction (Hnot_key Hcontr).
Qed`

original: intros tr o Hnot_key Hkey_in_both. unfold key_in_output_trace, key_in_output_list in *. intros Hcontr. destruct Hkey_in_both as [os [h [Hin_key Hkey_in_os]]]. contradiction (Hnot_key Hcontr).
